displayNameHelper: Optional for sign-in, required for sign-up. This name will be displayed in the app.
accountCreatedToastDescription: Welcome! Your account has been successfully created. Please check your email to verify your account if required.
displayNameRequiredToast: Display name is required for sign up.
noWeatherData: No weather data to display. Try fetching for a location.
geolocationNotSupportedToastDescription: Your browser does not support geolocation, or it's disabled. Please enter location manually.
fetchingWeatherForCurrentLocationToast: Fetching weather for your current location...
geolocationErrorToastDescription: Could not get current location: {{message}}. Using default.
invalidLatLonToastDescription: Please enter valid latitude (-90 to 90) and longitude (-180 to 180).
pestAlertsWidgetDescription: AI-generated pest alerts based on your location.
noSpecificPestAlertsDescription: Currently, no specific high-risk pest alerts for your location. See general advice below.
noPestAlertData: No pest alert data. Try fetching for a location.
fetchingPestAlertsForLocationToast: Fetching pest alerts for Lat: {{lat}}, Lon: {{lon}}.
marketTrendsWidgetDescription: AI-generated agricultural market trends for your region.
noSpecificCropTrendsAvailableDescription: The AI could not generate specific crop trend data for this location, or the location is unsuitable for common agriculture. See summary if available.
noMarketTrendData: No market trend data. Try fetching for a location.
marketTrendsFooterDisclaimer: Disclaimer: Market trends are AI-generated simulations for informational purposes only and not financial advice.
fetchedMarketInsightsForLocationToast: Fetched market insights for Lat: {{lat}}, Lon: {{lon}}.
aiCropAdvisorCardDescription: Get AI-powered crop recommendations based on your farm data.
regionCoordinatesPlaceholder: e.g., Central Valley or Lat: 34.05, Lon: -118.24
cropHistoryPlaceholder: Describe the crops grown on your farm in recent years
currentWeatherSummaryPlaceholder: e.g., Sunny, 25°C, light breeze, recent rain
currentMarketDataSummaryPlaceholder: e.g., Corn prices stable, high demand for organic produce
feedbackPlaceholder: Provide feedback on the AI recommendations (optional)
profileHistoryDescription: Review your past AI crop recommendations and inputs.
errorLoadingHistoryDetails: Could not retrieve your history at this time:
profileNotSignedIn: Please sign in to view your profile and history.
